ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: the Blazing Fire will be his refuge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Will surely have Hell for his abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: most surely his abode shall be Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then indeed hell only is his destination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, his abode will be the Hell;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then surely the hell, that is the abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: surely Hell shall be the refuge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! hell will be his home.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily the Scorch! that shall be his resort.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: his refuge will indeed be hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, his abode will be Hell-fire;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: surely, Hell will be their refuge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then indeed, Hellfire will be [his] refuge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:39] Hell-fire will indeed be the abode, his abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! Hell will be his home) the Fire is the home of him who is thus.
